trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Poplarville
There were no other sightings in Poplarville on or around December 12th 1999
divs: Sighting Details1. at home sitting on my deck 2.the lights 3.did not know 4.amazment 5.theobject was huge it was approx. 2 miles high w and appendage out the back of themain body. it had several lights in the further most corners.what amazed me wasthe size,it completely blocked out stars if i had to guess i would say it wasaleast 3 football fields long and half as wide.it made almost no sound just aslight hum. it appeared to move so slow ,a normal aircraft would have not stayedaloft. i watched it for about 5 minutes till it was out of sight.
